channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass cuttings, 19th August
item.description:
Why would they leave grass cuttings just inside the entrance of Whitehall rec southlands rd exit entrance. To decompose it will end up being scattered all over the place also itâ€™s very near to my back garden worried it will end up smelling like a compost heap. If I dumped my grass cuttings there I would be in trouble. I Pay for garden stickers to have my garden waste taken away or i book to take it to Churchfields . Why are you allowing this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Southlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bags fly tipped in bushes, 19th August

item.title: Old tyres dumped in overgrowth, 19th August
item.description:
Despite your gleeful response to inform me these had been removed, they are still at large! The bushes have almost covered them but the tyres remain in place. Please remove them.

item.title: Pothole outside 3 Camborne Road, 19th August
item.description:
I am 28 weeks pregnant and while crossing the road I fell down into the road due to stepping onto this pothole. There were weeds growing out of the pothole which obscured how deep the hole is. As a result of catching my foot in the pothole I injured my ankle, however this could have been more serious and done damage to myself and my unborn baby. This pothole needs to be fixed urgently as it is a hazard. There were potholes next to this one a couple of months ago which were fixed but this one has been missed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camborne Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Large pot holes and cracked road, 19th August
item.description:
Deep potholes which canâ€™t be avoided if coming from Sevonoaks way to go across to cray road, also long crack along the roundabout sane place. Not sure why they didnâ€™t do the whole roundabout when they did the other side! Damaged my tyre had to buy a new one!!!

item.title: OAP residents elderly residents garden, 19th August
item.description:
Ivy is over grown causing insects flys and pests to harbour. My Nan lives aloneand I want the garden looking lovely for her not over grown and messy. Itâ€™s not down to me to do this as itâ€™s communal land. The tree needs pollarding and some flowers all around the garden would be lovely. This is all some of the residents have to look at all day. I have bought flowers for her but the other issues are and eye soar and will break the fence over time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellingham Green, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 19th August
item.description:
Car has been here for 7 weeks minimum. Caused traffic to swerve into the opposite lane on a bend. Car window has been smashed in with a brick. Needs to be moved asap
